    • Method Detail

      • politeDownload

        private org.jsoup.nodes.Document politeDownload(java.lang.String docUrl)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Politeness Checks If document returned is null re-run 10 times until non null returned
        Parameters:
        docUrl - of type String to download the url
        Returns:
        Document required to download
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - throws IO Exception if connection breaks

      • getRobotsDisallowedURLs

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRobotsDisallowedURLs()
        Private Method to retrieve robots.txt for obeying
        Returns:
        List of disallowed URL String

      • validateRobotsText

        boolean validateRobotsText(java.lang.String url)
        Private Method to validate the URL's hit are not present in robots.txt
        Parameters:
        url - is the url to be validated
        Returns:
        boolean true or false depending upon check respectively.

      • getMoviesList

        void getMoviesList()
        Method can be called from same package. Method is called from Main class to start crawling and retrieve the movie list.

      • getTable

        private org.jsoup.select.Elements getTable()
        Private Method to parse and get the main table that contains all new releases in imdb release calendar using JSOUP
        Returns:
        a table of type Elements for further parsing

      • downloadPages

        private void downloadPages(java.util.List<Movie> moviesToDownload)
        Private Method is called by Runnable of each thread to retrieve desired data and upload to firestore.
        Parameters:
        moviesToDownload - of type List contains list of 5 or less movies provided by each thread.
